reviews.text: Came back to the Juan Carlos after about a year, having had a positive stay in December 2005. I had to regret to notice several steps back in terms of quality and customer service.
reviews.title: Worse after 1 year

reviews.text: The room had the TV half-broken (it was hard to switch it on) the technician spoke little English and was not helpful.
reviews.title: Holiday stay in Barcelona

likes.disliked: — indoor breakfast with no window views

reviews.text: The reception was not attentive: my g/f left a shirt in the breakfast room - called the reception and said it was not found. Guyess what? The next day at the breakfast we asked the staff there and they said they found it.
reviews.title: LIKE STAYING AT A MARRIOTT IN DENVER
